name: excalidraw-mcp
description: Excalidraw MCP Server with Real-Time Frontend
author: whallysson

scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "MCP,HTTP,FRONTEND" -c "magenta,cyan,green" "npm run dev:mcp --workspace=backend" "npm run dev --workspace=backend" "npm run dev --workspace=frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
